thread.title: Shannon
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Shannon

author: Shannon
title: Shannon
text:
Jason reviewed my situation thoroughly and explained my options and the processes. I felt secure in knowing that this would be dealt with professionally and my best interests in the solution presented to me.
As well, the amount of stress that has been lifted significantly and I feel that I will now have a secure future. Thank you.
